scene_description_enriched: A skeletal figure, representing Death, stands to the left, its jaw agape and empty eye sockets staring. It is draped in tattered cloth. To the right, a young woman, dressed in a long, flowing gown and a head covering, looks towards Death with a mixture of apprehension and resignation. The background is filled with stars, suggesting a nocturnal or celestial setting. The scene depicts the inevitability of death confronting a living person.
